definition: can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
CCTV New Year's Gala, Chinese New Year special/abbr. to 春晚[Chun1 Wan3]
pinyin: Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4

sentences.english: In SCB, dancing in the new year eve celerbration also.
sentences.chinese: 深圳渣打银行新年除夕晚会，舞蹈表演。

sentences.english: You want to go to homecoming with me?
sentences.chinese: 你想和我一起去返校晚会？

sentences.english: We should meet to talk over the party.
sentences.chinese: 我们得见见面，谈谈晚会的事。

sentences.english: They locked their eyes at the party.
sentences.chinese: 他们在那个晚会上对上了眼。

sentences.english: Our head teacher has shared the cake among all the students at the party.
sentences.chinese: 我们的班主任老师在晚会上把蛋糕分给每个学生。

sentences.english: Yesterday, I participated in the 4th Youth Technology Festival awards evening of WISCO.
sentences.chinese: 昨天，我参加了武钢第四届青年科技节颁奖晚会。

sentences.english: We have an English Speaking Competition, singing and dancing competition at the party.
sentences.chinese: 晚会上，我们举行英语演讲比赛和歌舞比赛。

sentences.english: Getup . You're going to that party and you'll have to hurry.
sentences.chinese: 起来，你要去参加晚会，而且你要快点。

sentences.english: At party, the little boy demeaned himself well.
sentences.chinese: 晚会上，那男孩表现很好。

sentences.english: He improvised a poem at the evening party.
sentences.chinese: 他在晚会上现编了一首诗。

sentences.english: Then we can have one more program at our party?
sentences.chinese: 那么我们的晚会能多个节目了？

sentences.english: They did a comedy act at the party .
sentences.chinese: 他们在晚会上扮演了笑剧。

sentences.english: At the Chirstmas party. We have chocolate, turkey, pudding, etc.
sentences.chinese: 在圣诞节晚会上，我们有巧克力，火鸡，布丁等。

sentences.english: Oh, it's an invitation to your parents' retirement party next week.
sentences.chinese: 哦，这是参加你父母退休晚会的请贴。

sentences.english: Good evening , boys and girls , welcome to our dumpling party .
sentences.chinese: 晚上好，朋友们，欢迎来到我们的“饺流天下”晚会。

sentences.english: Lily: Matt finally asked me out to the prom yesterday.
sentences.chinese: 昨天迈特终于邀请我参加晚会了。

definition: abbr. for 春節聯歡晚會|春节联欢晚会[Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4]
CCTV New Year's Gala, Chinese New Year special/abbr. to 春晚[Chun1 Wan3]
pinyin: Chun1 jie2 Lian2 huan1 Wan3 hui4

definition: to act (in a play)/to perform/to put on (a performance)/performance/concert/show/CL:場|场[chang3],次[ci4]
